description: Single table detail in PG Database
title: PG Table Catalog

list.definition:
SELECT relname FROM pg_namespace nsp JOIN pg_class rel ON nsp.oid = rel.relnamespace
WHERE nspname NOT IN ('pg_catalog', 'monitor', 'information_schema') AND relkind = 'r';
list.name: relname
list.label: Relation
list.query:
SELECT relname FROM pg_namespace nsp JOIN pg_class rel ON nsp.oid = rel.relnamespace
WHERE nspname NOT IN ('pg_catalog', 'monitor', 'information_schema') AND relkind = 'r';

targets.rawSql: SELECT relnamespace::RegNamespace FROM pg_class WHERE relname = '$relname';
SELECT relkind FROM pg_class WHERE relname = '$relname';

SELECT *
FROM (
         SELECT relpages ::BIGINT,
                (relpages * 8192::REAL)    AS relsize,
                reltuples ::REAL,
                age(relfrozenxid) ::BIGINT AS age
         FROM pg_class c
         WHERE relname = '${relname}'
         LIMIT 1) a,
     (
         SELECT n_live_tup AS live_tup,
                n_dead_tup AS dead_tup,
                CASE WHEN (n_live_tup + n_dead_tup) > 0 THEN n_dead_tup::NUMERIC / (n_live_tup + n_dead_tup) ELSE 0 END AS dead_ratio
         FROM pg_stat_user_tables
         WHERE relname = '$relname' LIMIT 1
     ) b;
SELECT ratio AS "Bloat Ratio" FROM monitor.pg_table_bloat WHERE relname = '$relname'

SELECT  oid             ,
        relnamespace    ,
        reltype         ,
        reloftype       ,
        relowner        ,
        relam           ,
        relfilenode     ,
        reltablespace   ,
        reltoastrelid   
FROM pg_class c
WHERE relname = '${relname}'

SELECT relhasindex     :: INTEGER,
   relispartition      :: INTEGER,
   relisshared         :: INTEGER,
   relhasrules         :: INTEGER,
   relhastriggers      :: INTEGER,
   relhassubclass      :: INTEGER,
   relrowsecurity      :: INTEGER,
   relforcerowsecurity :: INTEGER,
   relispopulated      :: INTEGER
FROM pg_class c
WHERE relname = '${relname}'

SELECT relpages ::BIGINT,
       (relpages * 8192::REAL) AS relsize,  
       reltuples ::REAL,
       relallvisible ::BIGINT,
       relnatts ::BIGINT,
       relchecks ::BIGINT,
       relfrozenxid,
       age(relfrozenxid) ::BIGINT AS age,
       relminmxid
FROM pg_class c
WHERE relname = '${relname}';

SELECT 
   CASE relpersistence WHEN 'u' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS relunlogged,
   CASE relpersistence WHEN 't' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS reltemporary
FROM pg_class c
WHERE relname = '${relname}'

SELECT seq_scan,
       seq_tup_read,
       idx_scan,
       idx_tup_fetch,
       n_tup_ins,
       n_tup_upd,
       n_tup_del,
       n_tup_hot_upd
FROM pg_stat_user_tables
WHERE relname = '$relname' LIMIT 1;

SELECT vacuum_count + autovacuum_count                   AS vacuum_total,
       vacuum_count,
       to_char(last_vacuum, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')     AS last_vacuum,
       date_trunc('second', now() - last_vacuum)         AS since_last_vacuum,
       autovacuum_count,
       to_char(last_autovacuum, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS last_autovacuum,
       date_trunc('second', now() - last_autovacuum)     AS since_last_autovacuum,
       n_ins_since_vacuum
FROM pg_stat_user_tables
WHERE relname = '$relname'
LIMIT 1;

SELECT analyze_count + autoanalyze_count                   AS analyze_total,
       analyze_count,
       to_char(last_analyze, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')     AS last_analyze,
       date_trunc('second', now() - last_analyze)         AS since_last_analyze,
       autoanalyze_count,
       to_char(last_autoanalyze, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS last_autoanalyze,
       date_trunc('second', now() - last_autoanalyze)     AS since_last_autoanalyze,
       n_mod_since_analyze
FROM pg_stat_user_tables
WHERE relname = '$relname'
LIMIT 1;

SELECT s.attname,
       a.attnum,
       a.attstorage,
       a.attalign,
       attnotnull,
       s.null_frac,
       s.avg_width,
       s.n_distinct,
       s.correlation
FROM pg_attribute a LEFT JOIN pg_stats s  
ON s.attname = a.attname 
WHERE tablename = '$relname' AND a.attrelid IN (SELECT oid FROM pg_class WHERE relname = '$relname')
ORDER BY attnum;
SELECT relname, relpages::REAL * 8192 AS size FROM pg_class WHERE relname ~ '$relname';
